game

Class HauntedMaze

  • java.lang.Object
    • screen.ScreenObject
      • game.HauntedMaze

  • public class HauntedMaze
extends ScreenObject
    Represents the environment in which the main objects of the game are housed (Officer, Grinch, Traps, Blueprints, etc.)
    Author:
    Ishwar S.
